svt_i2c_slave_monitor_xml_writer_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_slave_monitor_xml_writer_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The svt_i2c_slave_monitor_xml_writer_callback class is extended from the svt_i2c_slave_monitor_callback class in order to write out protocol object information (using the svt_i2c_slave_xml_writer class).

function void  config_pre_output_port_put ( svt_i2c_slave_monitor monitor , svt_i2c_agent_configuration cfg )

Member Function Documentation

  function void
 svt_i2c_slave_monitor_xml_writer_callback::config_pre_output_port_put
 (  svt_i2c_slave_monitor monitor , svt_i2c_agent_configuration cfg  ) 

Called when method "reconfigure_via_task" is called in VIP agent

monitor - A reference to the svt_i2c_slave_monitor component that is issuing this callback.

cfg - A reference to the configuration descriptor object of interest.
